name: Mowtee Magic Burst
description:
This is a puzzle game that features characters from many JatoStyle puzzle games and some who did not get a full game but still made it into this mash up game.

This game was in the works for a long time and started off as other games that would evolve into this puzzle battle.

*The game is going to take some time so for now there is a VS Beta ready to be played.
The full version build will be updated over time but for now players can give the game a try even if there is a set rule and only 2 players only battle.
